title: Level is synced now, but I still can't comment or create a discussion?

replies.body: That's weird!  Are you getting any error messages?  When you select another page, does it still show your account on the top right?  You might need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) just in case something is bugging out in the background.  Let me know.  :D
